00015 BallTrackingVisualization::BallTrackingVisualization(QWidget *_parent) : QGLWidget( new CreateCoreGLContext(QGLFormat::defaultFormat()), _parent )
00016 
00017 {
00018 
00019   // re-size the widget to that of the parent (in this case the GLFrame passed in on construction)
00020   this->resize(_parent->size());
00021   startTimer(20);
00022   m_rgb = cvCreateMat(480,640,CV_8UC3);
00023 
00024   m_gray = cvCreateMat(480,640,CV_8UC1);
00025 
00026   m_nextBuffer = cvCreateMat(480,640,CV_8UC1);
00027   m_prevBuffer = cvCreateMat(480,640,CV_8UC1);
00028   m_diffBuffer = cvCreateMat(480,640,CV_8UC1);
00029 
00030   m_bufferDepthRaw=cvCreateMat(480,640,CV_8UC1);
00031   m_bufferDepthRaw1=cvCreateMat(480,640,CV_8UC1);
00032 
00033   m_binaryLowerThresh = 100.0;
00034   m_binaryMaxVal = 255.0;
00035   m_cannyLowerThresh = 100.0;
00036   m_cannyHigherThresh = 200.0;
00037   m_contourAreaThresh = 100.0;
00038   m_diffAreaThresh = 10.0;
00039   m_ellipsesize = 2;
00040   m_blurSize = 5;
00041   m_noOfTimesToDialate = 2;
00042 
00043   m_masterRigCheck = 0;
00044 
00045   for( unsigned int i = 0 ; i < 640*480 ; ++i)
00046   {
00047       m_depthinm[i] = 0;
00048   }
00049 
00050 
00051   m_momentList.clear();
00052 
00053   area = rectArea = 0.0;
00054 }

00056 // This virtual function is called once before the first call to paintGL() or resizeGL(),
00057 //and then once whenever the widget has been assigned a new QGLContext.
00058 // This function should set up any required OpenGL context rendering flags, defining display lists, etc.
00059 
00060 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 void BallTrackingVisualization::initializeGL()
00062 {
00063 
00064   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00065 
00066 
00067     //
00068   ngl::NGLInit *Init = ngl::NGLInit::instance();
00069   Init->initGlew();
00070 
00071   // now we have valid GL can create shaders etc
00072   ngl::ShaderLib *shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00073   shader->createShaderProgram("TextureTrack");
00074 
00075   shader->attachShader("TextureVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00076   shader->attachShader("TextureFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00077   shader->loadShaderSource("TextureVertex","shaders/TextureVert.glsl");
00078   shader->loadShaderSource("TextureFragment","shaders/TextureFrag.glsl");
00079 
00080   shader->compileShader("TextureVertex");
00081   shader->compileShader("TextureFragment");
00082   shader->attachShaderToProgram("TextureTrack","TextureVertex");
00083   shader->attachShaderToProgram("TextureTrack","TextureFragment");
00084 
00085   shader->linkProgramObject("TextureTrack");
00086   (*shader)["TextureTrack"]->use();
00087   shader->setShaderParam1i("tex",0);
00088 
00089   m_screen = new ScreenQuad(640,480,"TextureTrack");
00090 
00091 
00092 }
00093

00106 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 //This virtual function is called whenever the widget needs to be painted.
00108 // this is our main drawing routine
00109 void BallTrackingVisualization::paintGL()
00110 {
00111     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00112 
00113 
00114     KinectInterface *kinect=KinectInterface::instance();
00115 
00116     cv::Rect _boundsCheck = kinect->getBoxObject();
00117 
00118     if(kinect->getTrackingFlag())
00119     {
00120 
00121 
00122         static int _frameCount = 1;
00123        float depth = 0.0;
00124 
00125         kinect->getDepthRaw(m_bufferDepthRaw,m_depthinm);
00126 
00127         // commented for gpu trial
00128 
00129         cv::blur(m_bufferDepthRaw,m_bufferDepthRaw1,cv::Size(m_blurSize,m_blurSize)); // to reduce noise, smotthing has been done
00130         /*  cv::gpu::blur(m_bufferDepthRawGpu,m_bufferDepthRawGpu1,cv::Size(m_blurSize,m_blurSize));*/
00131 
00132         if(_frameCount == 1)
00133         {
00134             m_bufferDepthRaw1.copyTo(m_prevBuffer);
00135         }
00136 
00137         m_bufferDepthRaw1.copyTo(m_nextBuffer);
00138 
00139         // commented for gpu trial
00140 
00141         cv::absdiff(m_nextBuffer,m_prevBuffer,m_diffBuffer); // has gpu variant // bg subtraction by frame differencing ...GMM method seems good through forums if at all we need
00142         /*cv::gpu::absdiff(m_nextBufferGpu,m_prevBufferGpu,m_diffBufferGpu);*/
00143 
00144         m_nextBuffer.copyTo(m_prevBuffer);
00145 
00146         // commented for gpu trial
00147 
00148         m_diffBuffer.copyTo(m_gray);
00149         /*m_diffBuffer.copyTo(m_grayGpu);*/
00150 
00151         // commented for gpu tiral
00152         cv::threshold(m_gray,m_gray,m_binaryLowerThresh,m_binaryMaxVal,CV_THRESH_BINARY_INV); // nned to decide the thresh factors and the thresh method
00153         cv::Mat element = cv::getStructuringElement(cv::MORPH_ELLIPSE,cv::Size(m_ellipsesize,m_ellipsesize)); // need to decide this size
00154         cv::dilate(m_gray,m_gray,element,cv::Point(-1,-1),m_noOfTimesToDialate); // try swapping this with below and try increasing iterations
00155         cv::erode(m_gray,m_gray,element,cv::Point(-1,-1),m_noOfTimesToDialate);
00156 
00157         /*cv::gpu::threshold(m_grayGpu,m_grayGpu,m_binaryLowerThresh,m_binaryMaxVal,CV_THRESH_BINARY_INV);
00158         cv::Mat element = cv::getStructuringElement(cv::MORPH_ELLIPSE,cv::Size(m_ellipsesize,m_ellipsesize)); // need to decide this size
00159         cv::gpu::dilate(m_grayGpu,m_grayGpu,element,cv::Point(-1,-1),m_noOfTimesToDialate); // try swapping this with below and try increasing iterations
00160         cv::gpu::erode(m_grayGpu,m_grayGpu,element,cv::Point(-1,-1),m_noOfTimesToDialate);*/
00161 
00162         // commented for gpu trial
00163 
00164         // Detect edges using canny
00165         cv::Canny( m_gray, canny_output, m_cannyLowerThresh, m_cannyHigherThresh, 3 ); // maintiain upper::lower ratio as 2:1 or 3:1 for better results
00166                                                                                      // as suggested by CANNY
00167         /*  cv::gpu::Canny(m_grayGpu, canny_outputGpu, m_cannyLowerThresh, m_cannyHigherThresh, 3);*/
00168         // commented for gpu trial
00169 
00170         // Find contours
00171         cv::findContours( canny_output, contours, hierarchy, CV_RETR_LIST, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE, cv::Point(0, 0) ); // methods to be decided
00172         /*cv::findContours( canny_outputGpu, contours, hierarchy, CV_RETR_LIST, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE, cv::Point(0, 0) ); // methods to be decided*/
00173 
00174 
00175         cv::Mat drawing = cv::Mat::zeros( canny_output.size(), CV_8UC3 );
00176 
00177 
00178         for( int i = 0; i < contours.size(); i++ )
00179         {
00180 
00181             /* cv::drawContours( drawing, contours, i, cv::Scalar(255,0,0),-1, 8, hierarchy, 0, cv::Point() );*/ // -- DEV PURPOSE
00182 
00183             area = cv::contourArea(contours[i], false);
00184 
00185             cv::RotatedRect r = cv::minAreaRect(contours[i]);
00186 
00187 
00188 
00189             if (fabs(area) < m_contourAreaThresh) //my notes: this value is more important in reducing the false positives and filters out those false positives by preventing them
00190                                     // from getting processed further..provide in UI
00191             {
00192                 continue;
00193             }
00194             else
00195             {
00196                 // do nothing
00197             }
00198 
00199             if (fabs(fabs(area) - (r.size.width * r.size.height * 3.14 / 4)) < m_diffAreaThresh)
00200             {
00201 
00202                 m_momentList.push_back(cv::moments( contours[i], false ));
00203 
00204                 float _xMomentsTemp = static_cast<float>(cv::moments( contours[i], false ).m10/cv::moments( contours[i], false ).m00);
00205                 float _yMomentsTemp = static_cast<float>(cv::moments( contours[i], false ).m01/cv::moments( contours[i], false ).m00);
00206 
00207                 int depthIndex = (int)((640 - _xMomentsTemp) + (640 * _yMomentsTemp));
00208                 depth = m_depthinm[depthIndex] * 0.001;
00209 
00210                 if(depth != 0)
00211                 {
00212                    if((_xMomentsTemp >= _boundsCheck.x) && (_xMomentsTemp <= _boundsCheck.x + _boundsCheck.width)
00213                            && (_yMomentsTemp >= _boundsCheck.y) && (_yMomentsTemp <= _boundsCheck.y + _boundsCheck.height))
00214                    {
00215                        cv::ellipse(drawing,r,cv::Scalar(0,255,0),-1,8);
00216                        std::cout<<"Rect center x:"<<r.center.x<<"\n";
00217                    }
00218                  }
00219 
00220              }
00221 
00222           }
00223 
00224        _frameCount++;
00225 
00226        m_screen->draw(&drawing);
00227 
00228      }
00229      else
00230      {
00231         // tracking not yet started...do nothing
00232      }
00233 
00234 }
